data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a throw-in for Recife PE, close to Paranaense's area.
In the minute 5, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Recife PE throw-in in Paranaense's half.
In the minute 13, Recife PE push upfield but Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes quickly pulls them for offside.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Recife PE.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 20, Paranaense's Erick misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Paranaense are pushing forward but Christian's finish is wide of the goal.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 23, Free kick in a good position for Paranaense!
Recife PE pushes forward through Lucas Mugni, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
In the minute 27, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Recife PE are coming forward and Leandro Barcia gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
In the minute 30, Free kick Recife PE.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Ricardinho of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Paranaense at Ilha do Retiro.
Paranaense drives forward and Maycon Nikao gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
In the minute 40, Recife PE are pushing forward but Thiago Neves's finish is wide of the goal.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 43, Can Paranaense capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Paranaense drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 45, Free kick Paranaense.
5 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Paranaense.
Throw-in high up the field for Recife PE in Recife.
Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Ilha do Retiro.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Daniel Paulista is making the team's first substitution at Ilha do Retiro with Mikael replacing Ricardinho.
In the minute 46, Jonathan Gomez is replacing Marquinhos for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
In the minute 50, Paranaense are in shooting range from this free kick.
Paranaense's Renato Kayzer gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Goal! Thiago Neves gives Recife PE a 1-0 lead in Recife.
Patric instrumental with a fine assist.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
In the minute 56, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Leandro Barcia is booked for the home team.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 59, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Paranaense throw-in in Recife PE's half.
In the minute 62, Thiago Neves for Recife PE gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Paulo Autuori (Paranaense) is making a first substitution, with Wellington replacing Richard.
In the minute 63, Joao Victor is replacing Marcio Azevedo for the away team.
The away team replace Christian with Khellven.
Throw-in for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
In the minute 66, In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Iago Maidana (Recife PE) has received a first yellow card.
Khellven of Paranaense gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 67, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes waits before resuming play because Luan Polli for Recife PE is still down.
In the minute 71, Luan Polli has recovered and rejoins the match in Recife.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Recife PE just outside Paranaense's area.
In the minute 76, Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Important block from the Paranaense defence as Leandro Barcia fires in a strike for Recife PE.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
In the minute 78, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Leo Cittadini with Walter. This is the fourth substitution made today by Paulo Autuori.
In the minute 78, Luciano is on a sub for Thiago Neves for Recife PE.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a fourth substitution, with Marcio Araujo replacing Lucas Mugni.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 87, Paranaense make their fifth substitution with Carlos Eduardo replacing Reinaldo.
Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Recife PE.
In Recife, Paranaense push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 89, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Recife PE throw-in in Paranaense's half.
Throw-in Paranaense.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards the away team a throw-in.
At Ilha do Retiro the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
In Recife, Wellington (Paranaense) misses the target with a header.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
The home team have replaced Mikael with Chico. This is the fifth substitution made today by Daniel Paulista.
Erick (Paranaense) gets a yellow card.
He's off! Patric is shown a red card.
